alteredStates.name: Entangled
alteredStates.effect: The operative cannot perform actions that involve moving. At the start of its activation, roll 1D6 + APL. On a 6+, remove this state.

alteredStates.name: Bleeding
alteredStates.effect: At the start of the operative's activation, it suffers 1D3 wounds. Roll 1D6 + APL at the end of its activation. On a 5+, remove this state.

alteredStates.name: Burning
alteredStates.effect: At the start of the operative's activation, it suffers 1 wound. After 3 Activations, remove this state.

alteredStates.name: Supressed
alteredStates.effect: When this operative would activate, instead skip its activation and remove this state.

alteredStates.name: Mistbound
alteredStates.effect: Treats all terrain as mist zone, if in a mistzone increase density. At the start of its activation, roll 1D6 + APL. On a 5+, remove this state.

alteredStates.name: Electrified
alteredStates.effect: At the start of the operative's activation, it suffers 1D3 wounds and cannot retain critical successes. To remove, spend 1AP to 'ground' itself.

alteredStates.name: Corrupted
alteredStates.effect: Operative loses 1APL and suffers 1 wound at the end of each activation. Roll 1D6 + APL at the end of its activation. On a 6+, remove this state.

alteredStates.name: Disoriented
alteredStates.effect: Worsen WS/BS by 1. Roll 1D6 + APL at the end of its activation. On a 4+, remove this state.

weaponRules.name: Shockwave x"
weaponRules.effect: If a critical dice is retained, weapon gains blast x" weapon rule. (melee weapons treat as shooting actions against secondary targets)

weaponRules.name: Agile
weaponRules.effect: When resolving attack dices, resolve 1 dice before the fix sequence (if both weapons have this rule, active operative resolves first).

weaponRules.name: Fixed Result
weaponRules.effect: Attacks made with this weapon can't reroll any dice.

weaponRules.name: Mist-Accuracy
weaponRules.effect: This weapon isn't affected by mist's weapon skill penalties.

weaponRules.name: Drag x"
weaponRules.effect: If a critical dice is retained, move the enemy x" in the shortest possible direction towards the active operative.

weaponRules.name: Burning
weaponRules.effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply burning status to the target.

weaponRules.name: Bleeding
weaponRules.effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply bleeding status to the target.

weaponRules.name: Electrify
weaponRules.effect: If damage is made to the target during this action, apply Electrified status to the target.

weaponRules.name: Penetrating x
weaponRules.effect: Subtract x from the targets saving stat for this action.

weaponRules.name: Supressing
weaponRules.effect: Target operative and active operative roll 1D6 + APL if active operative score is higher, target becomes supressed.

weaponRules.name: Mist Dispersal
weaponRules.effect: Clears mist in a 3" radius for one round.

weaponRules.name: Psychic Push
weaponRules.effect: After attack, if at least one attack dice inflicted damage, move the target 2″. Roll one D6, on a 2-, active suffers 1 wound.

weaponRules.name: Life Siphon
weaponRules.effect: Select 1 friendly operative visible and within 6". For each dice that deals damage, it heals 1 or 1D3 wounds if it was a critical. Once per turning point.

weaponRules.name: Quick Assault
weaponRules.effect: Once per battle: if this operative hasn't done a shoot action during this activation and performed a charge action, it can resolve two successful or critical hit dice in sequence and add 1dmg to both their damage characteristics.

weaponRules.name: Rending
weaponRules.effect: After rolling attack dice, if you retain a critical hit, you can retain a normal sucessful as critical

weaponRules.name: Balanced
weaponRules.effect: Re-roll one failed attack die.

weaponRules.name: Stun
weaponRules.effect: Target loses 1AP on its next activation.

weaponRules.name: Ceaseless
weaponRules.effect: Choose a number and re-roll all attack dice with results of that number.

weaponRules.name: Brutal
weaponRules.effect: Opponent can only parry with critical successes.

weaponRules.name: Punishing
weaponRules.effect: After rolling attack dice, if you retain a critical hit, you can retain a failed dice as successful.

weaponRules.name: Lethal x+
weaponRules.effect: Critical hits are scored on unmodified rolls of x+ instead of 6.

weaponRules.name: Shock
weaponRules.effect: After rolling attack dice if you retain a critical hit, you can discard one of your opponent's success attack dice (critical if no normal).

weaponRules.name: Saturate
weaponRules.effect: Weapon removes cover save bonuses.

weaponRules.name: Relentless
weaponRules.effect: After rolling attack dice, you can re-roll any number of dices.

weaponRules.name: Devastating x
weaponRules.effect: Deal x wounds on critical hits.

weaponRules.name: Heavy
weaponRules.effect: This weapon can't be used in the same activation as a move action.

weaponRules.name: Piercing Crits x
weaponRules.effect: After rolling attack dice, weapon gains Piercing X if any critical hits are retainted.

weaponRules.name: Silent
weaponRules.effect: Weapon can be used on conceal order.

weaponRules.name: Entangle
weaponRules.effect: Target becomes Entangled on a successful hit.

weaponRules.name: Blast x″
weaponRules.effect: All operatives within x″ of the target are also attacked.

weaponRules.name: Push x″
weaponRules.effect: Move the target x″ away after a successful hit.

weaponRules.name: Psychic
weaponRules.effect: This attack is resolved as a psychic action.

weaponRules.name: Break
weaponRules.effect: This weapon is destroyed after use.
